scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css static/css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle static/sass/modules static/js/modules
scripts.build: node-sass --include-path node_modules static/sass --output static/css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css' && postcss --use cssnano --dir static/minified 'static/css/**/*.css' && yarn run copy-3rd-party
scripts.copy-3rd-party: yarn run copy-3rd-party-js && yarn run copy-3rd-party-css
